original_text: And it came to pass, when all that knew him beforetime saw that, behold, he prophesied among the prophets, then the people said one to another, What is this that is come unto the son of Kish? Is Saul also among the prophets?
korean_text: 전에 사울을 알던 모든 사람들이 사울이 선지자들과 함께 예언함을 보고 서로 이르되 기스의 아들에게 무슨 일이 일어났느냐 사울도 선지자들 중에 있느냐 하고

sentences.original_text: when all that knew him beforetime saw that
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 이전에 알던 모든 사람들이 그것을 보고

sentences.original_text: behold, he prophesied among the prophets
then the people said one to another
What is this that is come unto the son of Kish?
Is Saul also among the prophets?
